response.overview: Story built only with the experiences and stories of children between 6 and 12 years old, who, faced with the violence exercised against them by their families, choose to live on the street, having to face the permanent danger of death at their young age. .  Accompanying a gallada (group that protects itself to live on the street) in its adventures in the city of Bogotá, in the midst of which the children tell their life story that reveals the maturity to which circumstances have forced them to reach.
response.title: Niños en la Via
